From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

(Redirected from Operation Parindey (film))
Indian filmdirected by Sanjay Gadhvi
 A major contributor to this article appears to have a close connection with its subject. It may require cleanup to comply with Wikipedia's content policies, particularly neutral point of view. Please discuss further on the talk page. (June 2020) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)


Operation ParindeyFilm posterDirected bySanjay GadhviWritten byTejas DhhanrajStarring
Amit Sadh
Rahul Dev
Aakash Dahiya
Amit Gaur
Rucha Inamdar
Kunal Kumar
CinematographyArkodeb MukherjeeEdited byMukesh ThakurDistributed byZee5Release date
28 February 2020 (2020-02-28)
Running time60 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Operation Parindey is a 2020 Indian action film directed by Sanjay Gadhvi,[1][2][3] written by Tajas Dhhanraj[4] and produced by Arti Gudal. The movie released on 28 February 2020 starring Amit Sadh and Rahul Dev.[5]
The movie marked the final directorial work of Sanjay Gadhvi before his death on 19 November 2023.

Cast[edit]
Amit Sadh as STF Abhinav Mathur[6]
Rahul Dev as Monty Singh[7]
Aakash Dahiya as Pabbi
Amit Gaur as Kartar Singh[7]
Rucha Inamdar as STF Komal  Bhardawaj[7]
Kunal Kumar as Srini [8]
R Badree as Rajan[8]
